TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewEditMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定用户如何在 控件中启动单元格编辑。

span.span: Specifies how a user starts cell editing in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此枚举由属性控件。This enumeration is used by the property of the control. 所有除外 EditProgrammatically 值允许用户双击单元格以开始编辑它。All values except for EditProgrammatically allow a user to double-click a cell to begin editing it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example illustrates the use of this type. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 为 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中指定编辑模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-specify-the-edit-mode-for-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [How to: Specify the Edit Mode for the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-specify-the-edit-mode-for-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#067](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#067)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#067](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#067)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode EditOnEnter = int32(0)

summary.span: 当单元格接收到焦点时即可开始编辑。

span.span: Editing begins when the cell receives focus.

summary.span: 在按 Tab 键在行中横向输入值，或按 Enter 键在列中纵向输入值时，此模式非常有用。

span.span: This mode is useful when pressing the TAB key to enter values across a row, or when pressing the ENTER key to enter values down a column.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode EditOnF2 = int32(3)

summary.span: 当单元格获得焦点时按 F2 开始编辑。

span.span: Editing begins when F2 is pressed while the cell has focus.

summary.span: 此模式将选择点放置在单元格内容的末尾。

span.span: This mode places the selection point at the end of the cell contents.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode EditOnKeystroke = int32(1)

summary.span: 当单元格获得焦点时按任意字母数字键开始编辑。

span.span: Editing begins when any alphanumeric key is pressed while the cell has focus.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode EditOnKeystrokeOrF2 = int32(2)

summary.span: 当单元格获得焦点时按任意字母数字键或 F2 开始编辑。

span.span: Editing begins when any alphanumeric key or F2 is pressed while the cell has focus.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditMode EditProgrammatically = int32(4)

summary.span: 仅在调用 方法时开始编辑。

span.span: Editing begins only when the method is called.
